It was as Tucson suspected, the only bot who could sense and detect Nightst=
rike was indeed him and possibly Tallon.  Neither Guardia or Ravenchief cou=
ld detect Nightstrike for some odd reason, but he was as real as any physic=
al body.

"Apparently our enemy has the ability to cloak even his energy si=
gnature.  If it weren't for my sonar equipment, I don't think I would have =
picked up on him either." 

He bursts into a speedy advance on his wheels, =
makes it into the next room, and transforms again into robot mode, skidding=
 on the floor, while doing so.  He makes it into the next room where Nights=
trike had gone into.  By using sonar equipment, he scans the the room, pick=
s up a strong ping, and again locks onto his foe.

" Come on, I Thought you=
'd make this a lot harder for me! I barely even got scratched!"
